email.subject: HEA CLOSURE RECEIVED
email.body:
__header__
PI:__piName__
HEA ID:__id8ID__
Sponsor:__coiSponsor__
The HEA Closure notice for the above-mentioned project has been received and the status of your Disclosure has now been changed to Complete. Please ensure your project records are retained in accordance with all legal and regulatory requirements.
Please login to the __url__ to access any task or view your HEA Disclosure. Please ensure you are using a supported browser; Chrome, Firefox or Microsoft Edge.

email.subject: 30 DAY REMINDER TO RENEW OR CLOSE HEA Disclosure- __id8ID__ - __coiSponsor__
email.body:
PI:__piName__
HEA ID:__id8ID__
Sponsor:__coiSponsor__
Action Required:30 DAY REMINDER TO RENEW OR CLOSE
ACTION REQUIRED
HEA Disclosure Renewal:
If you wish to continue your project beyond this expiry date, you must submit a completed HEA Renewal to our office a minimum of two weeks before the expiry date. Failure to submit the form prior to expiration will result in suspension of your study related activities.
HEA Closure:
If your HEA has concluded, please initiate a HEA Closure prior to the expiration date.
Please contact the IRB Office if you have any questions: hsrpp@honorhealth.com
Please login to the __url__ to access any task or view your HEA Disclosure. Please ensure you are using a supported browser; Chrome, Firefox or Microsoft Edge.

email.subject: EXPIRATION NOTIFICATION - PLEASE RENEW OR CLOSE HEA Disclosure - __id8ID__ - __coiSponsor__
email.body:
PI:__piName__
HEA ID:__id8ID__
Sponsor:__coiSponsor__
Action Required:EXPIRATION NOTIFICATION - PLEASE RENEW OR CLOSE
The HEA above EXPIRED on __rulesField1__.
All study related research activity must cease until new approval is granted. Activity includes all advertising, recruitment, screening, enrollment of new study participants, continued data collection, and any communication with participants.
ACTION REQUIRED
HEA Disclosure Renewal:
If you wish to continue your project beyond this expiry date, you must submit a completed HEA Renewal to our office a minimum of two weeks before the expiry date. Failure to submit the form prior to expiration will result in suspension of your study related activities.
HEA Closure:
If your HEA has concluded, please initiate a HEA Closure prior to the expiration date.
Please contact the IRB Office if you have any questions: hsrpp@honorhealth.com
Please login to the __url__ to access any task or view your HEA Disclosure. Please ensure you are using a supported browser; Chrome, Firefox or Microsoft Edge.
